National Association of Educational
Boadcasters, 1346 Connecticut Ave. N.W
Re earlier contact Harris concerned lack of response*
If your Governor hasn't replied urge him to do so soonest.
Specially important your State since Congressman on Committee.
Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C.
